column3: What about renaming both to the same name? e.g. `input_list`, since it always refers to the input list, regardless of what iteration we are on.
> What about renaming both to the same name?\n\nIIRC it made it easier for me to think about the test as I wrote it, but if others find that clearer I can do that too
In the interest of a quicker merge of this clear test bug, took Marco's suggestion
Sorry, I think the previous solution was also fine. Just forgot about this.
